testsuite.name: MainBankTest

testcase.name: start

failure.message:
java.lang.AssertionError: Wrong answer in test #1
Your program should print '1. Exchange Rates, 2. Chat Support, 3. Security Settings, 4. Exit' but it printed '1. Exchange Rate, 2. Logout'
Please find below the output of your program during this failed test. Note that the '>' character indicates the beginning of the input line.
---
Would you like to login or register? 1. Login, 2. Register: > 2 Registration Login: > 11805144712 Password: > nV1w2NU!rcSo4YE
Enter the data again to complete the registration Login: > 11805144712 Password: > nV1w2NU!rcSo4YE
Congratulations on your successful registration! Now you can log in!
Authorization Login: > 11805144712 Password: > nV1w2NU!rcSo4YE Authorization successful
Good to see you! Menu 1. Exchange Rate, 2. Logout
